mapper.insert: insert into deliveryman (id, name, sex, age, phone, status, grade) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update deliveryman set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, sex, age, phone, status, grade from deliveryman
